name: ITC Kohenur - A Luxury Collection Hotel
location: Hyderabad, Hitech City | 21.3 km from city centre

description.short: An award-winning property, ITC Kohenur, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Hyderabad features a magnificent infrastructure, sophisticated rooms, an incredible culinary journey, and top-notch leisure amenities.
description.long: ITC Kohenur, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Hyderabad offers a magnificent infrastructure, comprising 274 luxurious rooms, including 9 uniquely designed suites and 27 service residences, making it amongst the largest in the city. The hotel takes design inspiration from the famous Koh-i-Noor diamond, with a cascade of locally-made bangles greeting guests upon entry, reflecting a 'regional' and sophisticated theme  . The property boasts a serene setting, with 60% of the rooms and suites overlooking a freshwater lake, providing a calm retreat amidst the city's hustle and bustle. Additionally, ITC Kohenur offers an incredible culinary journey and top-notch leisure amenities, making it a precious jewel in Hyderabad

name: Cloud 5 Studios
location: Hyderabad , Golconda Fort11.2 kms away ; Salar Jung Museum17.4 kms away

description.short: Cloud 5 Studios in Hitech City, Hyderabad offers an ideal stay option for both leisure and business travelers due to its convenient location with popular landmarks and sought-after spots like Miyapur Metro Statio and Golconda Fort
description.long: Cloud 5 Studios is a 4-star hotel located in Hitech City, Hyderabad, offering a convenient and comfortable stay for both leisure and business travelers 2 . The hotel's prime location ensures easy access to popular landmarks and sought-after spots, such as Miyapur Metro Station (8.4 km) and Golconda Fort (11.2 km) 2 . This makes it an ideal choice for those looking to explore the city or conduct business activities. Additionally, the hotel provides attractively located room service, a 24-hour front desk, and free Wi-Fi, catering to the needs of its guests
